About us, About us, 99 Group is a leading real estate technology company that operates real estate portals across South East Asia, specializing in digital property advertising. Headquartered in Singapore, it is currently operational in Singapore and Indonesia and employs over 500 employees. In Singapore, 99 Group operates 99.co, SRX.com.sg, while in Indonesia, it operates 99.co/id and Rumah123.com., We are looking for an experiencedExecutive Assistantto join our diverse team of people who are passionate about taking the real estate industry into the age of technology through innovation and a desire to solve its multitude of challenges., Executive Assistant, , What you'll do :, What you'll do :, -Provide administrative support to C-level executives (i.e., manage schedule, coordinate travel arrangement, greetings and screening visitors, handle expense report, manage meal/catering), -, -Act as the point of contact among executives, employees, vendors and other external stakeholders to handle communication flow., -Create and manage purchase orders for C-level executive related purchases, manage budget and cost., -Organize and prepare for any leadership level meeting,attend meetings and take accurate minutes, and follow up on action items to ensure timely execution., -Assist in preparing various documents, papers, reports, presentations, and correspondence., -Fulfill other duties as assigned by supervisor., , What you should have :, What you should have :, -Bachelor’s Degree, -, -5+ years in office administration and executive support, -Exceptional writing skills in English and Bahasa Indonesia to write independently, -Strong relationship management skills, -Presentable and good communicator, -High degree of responsiveness, strong decision making ability, and excellent attention to detail., -Strong organizational and coordination skills, with the ability to efficiently manage multiple tasks., , Pls complete this challneg round first if you are interested to proceed:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdResHHHrpj6F9wt45FCBW6X8tjyZ-B_Rx2mbrCeRA-5Rp_AQ/viewform?c=0&w=1, Pls complete this challneg round first if you are interested to proceed:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdResHHHrpj6F9wt45FCBW6X8tjyZ-B_Rx2mbrCeRA-5Rp_AQ/viewform?c=0&w=1,

Rantai Pasokan, - Unduh PO sesuai perkiraan pengiriman & kirimkan ke pabrik untuk diberi label, - Membantu, menindaklanjuti QPL dan pemeriksaan kualitas setiap minggu sebelum pengiriman untuk memastikan bahwa pemeriksaan tidak mempengaruhi pengiriman, - Memperbarui tabel pengiriman mingguan & email sesuai dengan master order list, , 3. Koordinasi Komunikasi, - Fokus pada penyediaan jembatan komunikasi yang efisien untuk berbgai sisi : sisi pengembangan, sisi Buyer , dan sisi pabrik, - Umpan balik yang tepat waktu kepada Management mengenai kendala, ketidaknormalan produk, kualitas, dll. di pabrik., - Penerjemahan dokumen dari Bahasa Indonesia / Inggris, - Penyelesaian tugas-tugas lain yang diberikan oleh atasan, , Persyaratan :, - Pendidikan minimal S1 (Sarjana), - Mahir berbahasa Inggris (fasih berbahasa Inggris, menyimak, membaca, dan menulis), - Memiliki pengalaman dibidang / industri yang sama lebih disukai, - Familiar dengan Komputer : Excel, PPT, email, GForm, Zoom, etc, - Keterampilan analisis & data processing, - Percaya diri & siap berkomunikasi dengan orang-orang dari berbagai negara, - Siap ditempatkan di Mayong, Jepara (Jawa Tengah),

Overview:, Overview:, Mindreach mencari lulusan baru, orang muda, dan orang-orang yang mau mendapatkan lebih banyak keterampilan, pengalaman dan memiliki kerinduan untuk belajar di ranah kreatif dan teknologi. Memiliki Keterampilan Photoshop akan lebih diutamakan tetapi bukan suatu keharusan. Pengalaman kerja atau gelar sarjana juga tidak harus selama Anda memiliki dorongan untuk belajar., Sebagai photo editor, Anda akan bekerja di lingkungan yang serba cepat, produksi tinggi, dan sensitif terhadap waktu. Anda akan mengerjakan pekerjaan bagi beberapa perusahaan E-commerce dan fashion terbesar di dunia, memungkinkan Anda untuk mendapatkan pengalaman berharga saat Anda memulai karir Anda. Anda akan mempelajari standar dan harapan yang diperlukan oleh sektor bisnis internasional, dan pengalaman yang akan Anda terima akan memberi Anda keunggulan kompetitif di antara rekan-rekan Anda., , Persyaratan:, Persyaratan:, Memiliki pola pikir berkembang atauGrowth Mindsetyang terbuka dengan tantangan, mau belajar hal baru dan pola pikir yang mau terus berkembang.Jujur, detail dan bertanggung jawab.Minimal pendidikan SMU/SMK atau sederajat, Diploma atau Sarjana.Mampu menggunakan Adobe Photoshop, seperti Pen Tool dan mengetahui tentang photo retouching. Job_title: Customer Service Admin untuk perusahaan Jasa Sewa Mobil
Descriptions: , Keterampilan Komunikasi yang Kuat: Seorang customer service harus dapat berkomunikasi dengan jelas dan secara efektif. Mereka harus dapat mendengarkan dengan saksama, memberikan jawaban yang tepat, dan mengatasi keluhan atau masalah dengan kecepatan dan keahlian.Kesabaran dan Ketekunan: Menghadapi pelanggan yang mungkin memiliki berbagai jenis pertanyaan, keluhan, atau permintaan membutuhkan kesabaran dan ketekunan. Seorang customer service yang baik harus dapat menjaga ketenangan dan merespons dengan baik dalam situasi yang sulit.Pengetahuan tentang Kendaraan: Seorang customer service juga perlu memiliki pengetahuan tentang jenis-jenis mobil yang disewakan dan persyaratan penyewaan. Mereka harus dapat memberikan informasi yang akurat dan membantu pelanggan dalam memilih mobil yang sesuai dengan kebutuhan mereka.Kemampuan dalam penggunaan sistem reservasi: Seorang customer service harus dapat menggunakan sistem reservasi dengan lancar untuk mengelola pertanyaan dan permintaan pelanggan. Kemampuan dalam menggunakan perangkat lunak dan sistem komputer yang relevan juga penting.Pelayanan Pelanggan yang Ramah: Yang terpenting, seorang customer service harus memiliki sikap yang ramah dan mampu memberikan layanan yang baik kepada pelanggan. Chandra Asri is the Indonesia's premier petrochemical producer with an integrated plant incorporating world class, state of-the-art technology and supporting facilities. We operate the country's only Naphtha Cracker producing high quality Olefins and Polyolefins, and is the sole domestic producer of Styrene Monomer and Butadiene., As one of the largest petrochemical companies in the region, Chandra Asri ensures our customers' satisfaction, which has been leading the growth of our market share within the last decade. This growth is a result of good corporate governance and prudent financial management. Businesswise, we are committed to establishing and integrating global partnerships while never compromising on service. Investing in our workforce as well as engaging in equitable corporate responsibility programs is at the heart of everything we do and is integral to our business., , We are looking for potential and , About us, About us, CAPTAIN AIR CONDITIONING INDONESIA merupakan perusahaan yg bergerak di bidang pendingin udara. Berdiri sejak 2018, dalam waktu 5 tahun CAPTAIN AIR CONDITIONING INDONESIA menjadi top 10 distributor salah satu brand AC di Indonesia dan akan terus berkembang. Kami mencari kandidat yg ulet, pekerja keras, teliti dan tahan banting untuk mendukung proses perkembangan bisnis kami yg masih mempunyai ruang yg sangat luas untuk berkembang. Roles Description, Roles Description, The Manager of Corporate Communication is a critical role within the organization responsible for developing and executing a comprehensive corporate communication strategy that aligns with the company’s goals and values. As a Manager Corporate Communication, you will play a key role in shaping our company's public image, reputation, and internal communication. You will be responsible for developing and executing a comprehensive corporate communication strategy that aligns with our values and objectives., We are committed to deliver service excellence through professionalism and innovation and fostering a positive impact on our community and the world through airport services. Our team is passionate, innovative, and driven by a shared vision to become the best choice in airport service solutions., Responsibilities:, Responsibilities:, 1. Strategic Communication Planning :Develop and implement a corporate communication strategy that effectively communicates the company's vision, mission, and core values to various stakeholders, including employees, clients, investors, and the public., 1. Strategic Communication Planning :, 2. Internal and External Communication:, 2. Internal and External Communication:, · Create and manage internal communication initiatives to keep employees informed and engaged, including social media, intranet content, corporate events and town hall meetings., · Manage external communication channels such as press releases, media relations, corporate events and social media to positively influence public perception and maintain a consistent brand image., 3. Crisis Communication:Prepare and execute crisis communication plans to protect the company's reputation during challenging situations., 3. Crisis Communication:, 4. Media Relations:Build and maintain relationships with media outlets, journalists, and influencers to secure positive media coverage and manage media inquiries., 4. Media Relations:, 5. Content Creation:Develop engaging content, including press releases, articles, speeches, and marketing collateral, to communicate key message effectively through Social Media (IG, Website, LinkedIn, etc.), 5. Content Creation:, 6. Brand Management:Ensure that all communication materials, both internal and external, are in line with the company's brand guidelines and values., 6. Brand Management:, 7. Stakeholder Engagement:Collaborate with internal teams and external stakeholders to understand their communication needs and align communication strategies accordingly., 7. Stakeholder Engagement:, 8. Measurement and Analytics:Monitor and evaluate the impact of communication initiatives, gathering feedback and data to make informed adjustments to the strategy., 8. Measurement and Analytics:, 9.Budget Management:Manage the corporate communication budget efficiently, ensuring cost-effective execution of communication initiatives., Budget Management:, Requirements:, Requirements:, · Bachelor's degree in Communications, Public Relations, or a related field. A master's degree is a plus., · Proven experience in corporate communication or public relations, with at least 5 years in a management role., · Strong written and verbal communication skills in English and Bahasa., · Excellent interpersonal and relationship-building., · Experience in crisis communication is highly desirable., · Proficiency in using various communication tools and technologies., · Knowledge of relevant legal and ethical considerations in communication., · Strong Project management skills., · Flexibility and adaptability to handle a dynamic and fast-paced environment., · Good knowledge with industry trend and best practices in corporate communications.,
